Package testproject

Class FlyingMonster

java.lang.Object
testproject.Monster
testproject.FlyingMonster
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchaseable
public class FlyingMonster extends Monster
A special type of Monster, with a fly move, that allows them to not take damage in the next turn.
